control_attributes.Control: AC-16 (6) MAINTENANCE OF ATTRIBUTE ASSOCIATION BY ORGANIZATION
control_attributes.control_description: The organization allows personnel to associate, and maintain the association of [Assignment: organization-defined security attributes] with [Assignment: organization-defined subjects and objects] in accordance with [Assignment: organization-defined security policies].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system protects wireless access to the system using authentication of [Selection (one or more): users; devices] and encryption.

Control Statement: The organization allows personnel to associate, and maintain the association of [Assignment: organization-defined security attributes] with [Assignment: organization-defined subjects and objects] in accordance with [Assignment: organization-defined security policies].
Control Name: AC-16 (6) MAINTENANCE OF ATTRIBUTE ASSOCIATION BY ORGANIZATION
